servinfo.title: Clutch Pedal Position (CPP) Switch (for Cruise Control) Inspection and Adjustment

ptxt.intxrefpoff: CPP Switch (for Cruise Control) Removal and Installation

servinfosub.title: Inspection
servinfosub.ptxt: Check for resistance between terminals under each condition below. If check result is not satisfactory, replace.

spec.title: CPP switch (for cruise control) resistance
spec.ptxt: When switch shaft is pushed [A]: No continuity
When switch shaft is free [B]: Continuity

servinfosub.title: Adjustment
servinfosub.ptxt: For adjustment, refer to “Installation” under CPP Switch (for Cruise Control) Removal and Installation .
